“O‘zgidromet” Toshkent havosida zararli moddalar me’yordan oshganini ma’lum qildi

05 Nov 2019, 13:13

“O‘zgidromet” Toshkent havosida zararli moddalar me’yordan oshganida haqida xabar berdi.


Foto: Ekologiya qo‘mitasi matbuot xizmati

1—3-noyabr va 4-noyabr tongida Toshkent shahridagi meteorologik sharoitlar shaharning havo muhitida zararli moddalarning bir oz tarqalishiga imkoniyat yaratdi.
Statsionar postlarning kuzatuv ma’lumotlariga ko‘ra, quyidagi tumanlarda havoning ifloslanishi bir martalik maksimal ruxsat etilgan me’yor (REM b.m.) dan ortgani qayd etilgan.
Azot dioksidi bo‘yicha:
Yakkasaroy, Mirobod, Qibray tumanlarida REM b.m. dan yuqori 4 holat kuzatildi.
Uglerod oksidi bo‘yicha:
Yashnobod tumanida REM b.m. dan yuqori 1 holat kuzatildi.
Boshqa tumanlarda olingan ma’lumotlar bo‘yicha zararli moddalar miqdori ruxsat etilgan me’yor (REM b.m.)dan yuqori bo‘lgani kuzatilmadi.
6-noyabr va 7-noyabr tongida Toshkent shahrining ob-havo sharoiti shahar havo muhitida zararli moddalarning bir oz tarqalishiga imkoniyat yaratadi.
Mavzuga doir: Hindistonda havoning ifloslanish darajasi 10 baravarga oshdi
3-noyabr, yakshanba kuni Hindistonning poytaxt okrugi hisoblangan Dehlida havoning ifloslanish ko‘rsatkichlari Butunjahon sog‘liqni saqlash tashkiloti belgilagan me’yordan 10 baravar ko‘payib ketgan. Nyu-Dehlida bir necha kundan beri maktablar yopilgan, Indira Gandi nomidagi xalqaro aeroportda 40 ga yaqin samolyot reyslari bekor qilingan.

Uzhydromet reports that hazardous substances in the air in Tashkent exceed the norm

05 Nov 2019, 13:13

"Uzhydromet" reports that hazardous substances in the air in Tashkent exceed norms.


Photo: Press Service of the Ecology Committee

On the morning of November 1-3 and November 4, meteorological conditions in the city of Tashkent allowed the distribution of harmful substances in the city's air.
According to stationary surveillance data, it is noted that air pollution exceeds the maximum permissible limit (REM bpm) in the following districts.
For nitrogen dioxide:
REM in Yakkasaray, Mirabad, Kibray districts 4 cases were observed.
By Carbon Monoxide:
REM in Yashnabad District 1 case over.
In other areas, the amount of pollutants in the data was not higher than the permissible limit (REM bpm).
The weather conditions of Tashkent on the morning of November 6 and November 7 will allow for a small distribution of harmful substances in the city's atmosphere.
Topic: Air pollution in India has increased tenfold
On Sunday, November 3, Delhi, the capital of India, has 10 times more air pollution than the World Health Organization. Schools were closed for several days in New Delhi, and around 40 flights were canceled at Indira Gandhi International Airport.
